title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 351.7 - Loan insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 351.7 - Loan insurance

State Regulations

All loans shall be covered by loan insurance commencing 30
days following the date of the making of the loan, as required by sections
517-c, 613-b
and
1207
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Changes in the loan insurance rate shall become effective on April
1st. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
351.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
